message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $1200000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your life or business. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $1150000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to its true worth. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional deal. I look forward to your positive response.
